function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited options for social-distancing measures in health care facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious spread among patients and healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control protocols, use of PPE, and regular testing","Technologies":"Air purification systems, ventilation management, and UV-C disinfection","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Cohousing patients with vastly different requirements","Impact":"Potential cross-contamination and increased risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Designate separate zones for different patient groups, strict cleaning protocols, and use of PPE","Technologies":"Negative pressure isolation rooms, air filtration systems, and UV-C disinfection","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Hospital administration"},{"Description":"Positively pressurized protective environment (PE) rooms","Impact":"Risk of outside airborne infectious agents entering the room","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of ventilation systems, use of HEPA filters, and air pressure monitoring","Technologies":"HEPA filtration, ventilation management, and air pressure sensors","People":"Immunocompromised patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Facility engineering and maintenance"}]}
